title: Is a Harvard University online MBA worth it? - Quora

response.answer_text: These types of questions are difficult to answer due to their imprecision. However, If you’re asking if the (potential) financial return is great enough to justify the costs (money, time, other sacrifices), that is another issue. For that answer, I would try to obtain post degree employment/salary information from Harvard and do a cost/benefit comparison. Remember, averages, ranges are only rough guides. A degree of any type is not a guarantee of success, no matter how one defines it.
My friend is doing it. He says it is very challenging and he already started his own business. It is worth it because you can easily manage work and study balance and the name speaks for itself
